Package interfaces

Interface IProjectService

public interface IProjectService
Interface for managing BTO Projects

    Handle flat booking process based on user role - Applicant: Reserve a flat and set application status to PENDING_BOOKING - Officer: Confirm booking and set application status to BOOKED

  • Method Details

    • getAllProjects

      Map<String,BTOProject> getAllProjects()
      Retrieve all BTO Projects
      Returns:
      Map of BTO Project name to BTOProject object

    • getProjectByName

      BTOProject getProjectByName(String projectName)
      Retrieve specific project by its name
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of project
      Returns:
      BTOProject object if found, null otherwise

    • createProject

      BTOProject createProject(Manager manager, String projectName, String neighbourhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> unitCounts, Map<FlatType,Double> unitPrices, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int availableOfficerSlots)
      Create new BTOProject with provided details
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager creating the project
      projectName - Project name
      neighbourhood - Project neighbourhood
      unitCounts - Map of flat types to their number of units available
      unitPrices - Map of flat types to their unit prices
      openingDate - Project application opening date
      closingDate - Project application closing date
      availableOfficerSlots - Number of officers available for the project
      Returns:
      Created BTOProject object

    • deleteProject

      boolean deleteProject(Manager manager, String projectName)
      Delete a BTOProject
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager performing the deletion
      projectName - Name of project to delete
      Returns:
      true if project successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • projectExist

      boolean projectExist(String projectName)
      Check if a project with the given name exists
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name
      Returns:
      true if project exists, false otherwise

    • isProjectOpen

      boolean isProjectOpen(BTOProject project)
      Check if a project is currently open for applications
      Parameters:
      project - BTOProject object to check
      Returns:
      true if current date is within project's application period, false otherwise

    • flatTypeAvailable

      boolean flatTypeAvailable(BTOProject project, FlatType flatType)
      Check if a flat type is available in the given project
      Parameters:
      project - BTOProject object to check
      flatType - Flat Type to check
      Returns:
      true if flat type is available, false otherwise

    • checkOverlapPeriod

      boolean checkOverlapPeriod(Manager manager, String projectName, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate)
      Check for overlapping project periods created by the same manager
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager creating/editing the project
      projectName - Project name
      openingDate - Proposed opening date
      closingDate - Proposed closing date
      Returns:
      true if overlap exists, false otherwise

    • bookFlat

      boolean bookFlat(BTOApplication application, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType, User user)
      Handle flat booking process based on user role - Applicant: Reserve a flat and set application status to PENDING_BOOKING - Officer: Confirm booking and set application status to BOOKED
      Parameters:
      application - BTOApplication for booking
      project - BTOProject being booked
      flatType - Type of flat being booked
      user - User making the booking
      Returns:
      true if booking successful, false otherwise

    • editProjectName

      boolean editProjectName(Manager manager, String currentName, String newName, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit name of a given project
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager in charge of the project
      currentName - Current name of the project
      newName - New name for the project
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if project name edited successfully, false otherwise

    • editNeighbourhood

      boolean editNeighbourhood(String neighbourhood, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit neighbourhood of a given project
      Parameters:
      neighbourhood - New neighbourhood for the project
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if neighbourhood edited successfully, false otherwise

    • editNumUnits

      boolean editNumUnits(FlatType flatType, int numUnits, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit unit counts of a given project
      Parameters:
      flatType - Type of flat to edit
      numUnits - New number of units for the flat type
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if unit counts edited successfully, false otherwise

    • editPrice

      boolean editPrice(FlatType flatType, Double price, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit unit prices of a give project
      Parameters:
      flatType - Type of flat to edit
      price - New price for the flat type
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if unit prices edited successfully, false otherwise

    • editOfficerSlots

      boolean editOfficerSlots(int officerSlots, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit project officer slots of a given project
      Parameters:
      officerSlots - New number of officer slots for the project
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if officer slots edited successfully, false otherwise

    • editOpeningDate

      boolean editOpeningDate(LocalDate openingDate, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit opening date of a given project
      Parameters:
      openingDate - New opening date for the project
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if opening date edited successfully, false if it is after closing date

    • editClosingDate

      boolean editClosingDate(LocalDate closingDate, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit closing date of a given project
      Parameters:
      closingDate - New closing date for the project
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if closing date edited successfully, false if it is before opening date

    • editVisibility

      boolean editVisibility(boolean visible, BTOProject projectEdit)
      Edit visibility of a given project
      Parameters:
      visible - True if project is visible, false otherwise
      projectEdit - BTOProject object to be edited
      Returns:
      True if visibility edited successfully, false otherwise
